languages.text: Возможно, именно они и были правы. Далеко не все мерзости, что прорвались в шпиль Опустошительной бури из Имматериума, были выслежены и уничтожены. Сущности, прислуживавшие Пределу рассвета, затаились в самых темных углах, вынашивая планы дальнейшего разрушения Темного города и возможности нанести удар. Они знали, что возможность эта предоставится очень скоро.

Perhaps they were right. Not all the abominations from the Immaterium that broke into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest were hunted down. Entities that served the Edge of Daybreak hid in the darkest corners, making plans for the further destruction of the Dark City and waiting for the perfect moment to strike. They knew the opportunity would present itself very soon.
languages.original_text: Возможно, именно они и были правы. Далеко не все мерзости, что прорвались в шпиль Опустошительной бури из Имматериума, были выслежены и уничтожены. Сущности, прислуживавшие Пределу рассвета, затаились в самых темных углах, вынашивая планы дальнейшего разрушения Темного города и возможности нанести удар. Они знали, что возможность эта предоставится очень скоро.

traits.locale_text: Perhaps, they were right. Not all hideous things that broke into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest from the Immaterium, were hunted down. Entities that served the Edge of Daybreak hid in the darkest corners, preparing plans for further destruction of the Dark City, and waiting for the opportunity to strike. They knew that such an opportunity will present itself very soon.

Perhaps, they were right. Not all hideous things that broke into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest from the Immaterium, were hunted down. Entities that served the Edge of Daybreak hid in the darkest corners, preparing plans for further destruction of the Dark City, and waiting for the opportunity to strike. They knew that such an opportunity will present itself very soon.

Perhaps they were right. Not all the abominations from the Immaterium that broke into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest were hunted down. Entities that served the Edge of Daybreak hid in the darkest corners, preparing plans for the further destruction of the Dark City and waiting for the perfect moment to strike. They knew the opportunity would present itself very soon.

Entities that served the Edge of Daybreak hid in the darkest corners, preparing plans for the further destruction of the Dark City and waiting for the perfect moment to strike. They knew the opportunity would present itself very soon.

Perhaps they were right. Not all the abominations from the Immaterium that broke into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest were hunted down. Entities that served the Edge of Daybreak hid in the darkest corners, making plans for the further destruction of the Dark City and waiting for the perfect moment to strike. They knew the opportunity would present itself very soon.

Perhaps they were right. Not all the abominations from the Immaterium that broke into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest were hunted down. Entities that served the Edge of Daybreak hid in the darkest corners, making plans for the further destruction of the Dark City and waiting for the perfect moment to strike. They knew the opportunity would present itself very soon.

languages.text: 或许他们想得没错，因为并非所有闯入狂风阴谋团尖塔的亚空间怪物都被消灭了。破晓锋刃的仆从躲在最阴暗的角落，酝酿着进一步摧毁黑暗之城的计划。它们等待着最完美的时机，而且他们很清楚，这样的机会很快就会出现。
languages.original_text: Perhaps they were right. Not all the abominations from the Immaterium that broke into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest were hunted down. Entities that served the Edge of Daybreak hid in the darkest corners, making plans for the further destruction of the Dark City and waiting for the perfect moment to strike. They knew the opportunity would present itself very soon.

traits.locale_text: 或许他们想得没错，因为并非所有闯入狂风阴谋团尖塔的亚空间怪物都被消灭了。破晓锋刃的仆从躲在最阴暗的角落，酝酿着进一步摧毁黑暗之城的计划。它们等待着最完美的时机，而且他们很清楚，这样的机会很快就会出现。

languages.text: Vielleicht hatten sie recht. Nicht alle Abscheulichkeiten aus dem Immaterium, die in den Turm des plündernden Sturms eingedrungen waren, wurden erlegt. Wesen, die dem Rand des Tagesanbruchs dienten, versteckten sich in den dunkelsten Ecken, wo sie Pläne für die weitere Zerstörung der Dunklen Stadt schmiedeten und auf den perfekten Augenblick für den Angriff warteten. Sie wussten, die Gelegenheit würde sich schon bald bieten.
languages.original_text: Perhaps they were right. Not all the abominations from the Immaterium that broke into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest were hunted down. Entities that served the Edge of Daybreak hid in the darkest corners, making plans for the further destruction of the Dark City and waiting for the perfect moment to strike. They knew the opportunity would present itself very soon.

traits.locale_text: Vielleicht hatten sie recht. Nicht alle Abscheulichkeiten aus dem Immaterium, die in den Turm des plündernden Sturms eingedrungen waren, wurden erlegt. Wesen, die dem Rand des Tagesanbruchs dienten, versteckten sich in den dunkelsten Ecken, wo sie Pläne für die weitere Zerstörung der Dunklen Stadt schmiedeten und auf den perfekten Augenblick für den Angriff warteten. Sie wussten, die Gelegenheit würde sich schon bald bieten.

languages.text: Peut-être avaient-ils raison. Les abominations de l'Immaterium qui avaient pénétré dans la tour de la Tempête ravageuse ne furent pas toutes éliminées. Des entités au service de la Lame de l'Aube se tapissaient dans les recoins les plus sombres, tramant la destruction de la Cité Crépusculaire et attendant le bon moment pour frapper. Elles savaient que l'occasion se présenterait très bientôt.
languages.original_text: Perhaps they were right. Not all the abominations from the Immaterium that broke into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest were hunted down. Entities that served the Edge of Daybreak hid in the darkest corners, making plans for the further destruction of the Dark City and waiting for the perfect moment to strike. They knew the opportunity would present itself very soon.

traits.locale_text: Peut-être avaient-ils raison. Les abominations de l'Immaterium qui avaient pénétré dans la tour de la Tempête ravageuse ne furent pas toutes éliminées. Des entités au service de la Lame de l'Aube se tapissaient dans les recoins les plus sombres, tramant la destruction de la Cité Crépusculaire et attendant le bon moment pour frapper. Elles savaient que l'occasion se présenterait très bientôt.

languages.text: Tal vez tuvieran razón. No se dio caza a todas las abominaciones del Inmaterio que asaltaron la Torre de la Tempestad Asoladora. Las entidades que servían al Filo del Amanecer se ocultaban en los rincones más oscuros, preparando sus planes para la destrucción completa de la Ciudad Siniestra y esperando el momento indicado para atacar. Sabían que su oportunidad no se haría esperar.
languages.original_text: Perhaps they were right. Not all the abominations from the Immaterium that broke into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest were hunted down. Entities that served the Edge of Daybreak hid in the darkest corners, making plans for the further destruction of the Dark City and waiting for the perfect moment to strike. They knew the opportunity would present itself very soon.

traits.locale_text: Tal vez tuvieran razón. No se dio caza a todas las abominaciones del Inmaterio que asaltaron la aguja de la Tempestad Asoladora. Las entidades que servían al Filo del Amanecer se ocultaban en los rincones más oscuros, preparando sus planes para la destrucción completa de la Ciudad Siniestra y esperando el momento indicado para atacar. Sabían que su oportunidad no se haría esperar.

languages.text: おそらく彼らは正しかったのだ。〈略奪の嵐〉の尖塔に侵入した非物質世界の忌まわしき者たちがすべて狩られたわけではない。暁の刃に仕える存在たちは闇の隅に潜み、仄暗き都をさらに破壊するための計画を練り、攻撃の絶好の機会を狙っていた。彼らはその機会が間もなく訪れることを知っていたのだ。
languages.original_text: Perhaps they were right. Not all the abominations from the Immaterium that broke into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest were hunted down. Entities that served the Edge of Daybreak hid in the darkest corners, making plans for the further destruction of the Dark City and waiting for the perfect moment to strike. They knew the opportunity would present itself very soon.

traits.locale_text: おそらく彼らは正しかったのだ。〈略奪の嵐〉の尖塔に侵入した非物質世界の忌まわしき者たちがすべて狩られたわけではない。暁の刃に仕える存在たちは闇の隅に潜み、仄暗き都をさらに破壊するための計画を練り、攻撃の絶好の機会を狙っていた。彼らはその機会が間もなく訪れることを知っていたのだ。

languages.text: Belki de haklılardı. Tindiyar'dan Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'ne geçen yaratıkların tamamı öldürülemedi. Tan Vakti'ne hizmet eden varlıklar; en karanlık köşelerde saklandı, Kara Şehir'in daha da büyük bir yıkıma uğraması için planlar yaptı ve saldırmak için doğru anı bekledi. Bu fırsatın çok yakında karşılarına çıkacağını biliyorlardı.
languages.original_text: Perhaps they were right. Not all the abominations from the Immaterium that broke into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest were hunted down. Entities that served the Edge of Daybreak hid in the darkest corners, making plans for the further destruction of the Dark City and waiting for the perfect moment to strike. They knew the opportunity would present itself very soon.

traits.locale_text: Belki de haklılardı. Tindiyar'dan Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'ne geçen yaratıkların tamamı indirilemedi. Tan Vakti'ne hizmet eden varlıklar en karanlık köşelerde saklandı, Kara Şehir'in daha da büyük bir yıkıma uğraması için planlar yaptı ve saldıracak doğru anı bekledi. Bu fırsatın çok yakında karşılarına çıkacağını biliyorlardı.
